articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Flow is now down 26% over the last 30 days, coinciding with falling NFT activity on the platform and Dapper Labs’ recent layoffs.
articles.title: Flow Hits New Low After NFT Trading Craters, Dapper Downsizes

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Banks in the state must now submit a business plan to the NYDFS if they want to deal with crypto.
articles.title: New York Banking Regulator Sets Crypto Guidelines in Wake of FTX

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The former U.S. president is selling $99 digital trading cards that show him as a superhero, astronaut, and more.
articles.title: Donald Trump Now Has an NFT Collection—And Crypto Twitter 'Can’t Even'

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The UN Refugee Agency is turning to crypto to aid internally displaced persons and other war-affected people in Ukraine.
articles.title: UN Taps Stellar Blockchain to Send War-Impacted Ukrainians USDC Stablecoins

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: Untold numbers of ERC-20 tokens have been lost due to Coinbase incompatibility with the exchange—a new feature will finally retrieve them.
articles.title: New Coinbase Tool to Let Users Reclaim Stranded Ethereum Tokens

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The BitGo CEO said the withdrawal requests came as Sam Bankman-Fried petitioned investors for capital before announcing FTX's bankruptcy.
articles.title: BitGo ‘Held Up’ Alameda's $50M Wrapped Bitcoin Withdrawal Requests

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Current rules in France give crypto firms the option, but not the necessity, to gain a full license. That may soon change.
articles.title: France Mulls Full-Licensing Regime for Crypto Firms Citing FTX Bankruptcy

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: The crypto derivatives platform Paradigm today announced that it was slashing employees' salaries amid the dismal crypto market.
articles.title: Crypto Derivatives Platform Paradigm Slashes Salaries to ‘Reduce Need for Layoffs’

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Ark Investment’s funds scooped up another 297,000 shares in America’s largest cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase on Wednesday.
articles.title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Snaps Up Another $11.9M in Coinbase Stock

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Ryan Salame flagged transfers of customer funds from FTX to Alameda to Bahamian authorities just two days before FTX filed bankruptcy.
articles.title: FTX Digital Exec Tipped Off Bahamian Authorities About Funds Sent to Alameda

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The star of “Shark Tank” had some strong words for the exchange at the FTX hearing in the U.S. Senate today.
articles.title: Binance Deliberately Caused FTX Collapse: Kevin O’Leary

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The founders of IcomTech and Weltsys "presented a life of luxury," and now stand accused of conspiracy to commit fraud and money laundering.
articles.title: Justice Department Charges Nine in Crypto Ponzi Schemes

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre claimed she was bound from commenting on the matter by a Depression-era law.
articles.title: White House Refuses to Answer Questions About Sam Bankman-Fried Donations

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bitcoin nosedived following the central bank’s decision to raise rates by 50 basis points.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Drop Sharply After Fed Signals More Interest Rate Hikes to Come

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Some U.S. MetaMask users can now buy Ethereum directly from their wallet using PayPal.
articles.title: MetaMask Launches PayPal Integration for Ethereum Purchases

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The top Solana NFT marketplace is rolling out a rewards program with freebies and perks alongside an upcoming fee model shift.
articles.title: Magic Eden Will Reward Loyal Traders With Discounts, Free NFTs

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: It may feel like a lifetime ago, but Bitcoin was above $21,000 as recently as early November.
articles.title: Bitcoin Back Above $18,000 for First Time Since FTX Collapse

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Critics say that the bill, which would expand KYC requirements for crypto network participants, is “opportunistic” and “unconstitutional.”
articles.title: Senator Warren Introduces New Crypto Bill Targeting Self-Custody Wallets

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: “Holding your own crypto in your wallet is not risk-free,” said Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao today during a Twitter spaces.
articles.title: ‘99% of People' Will Lose Crypto Storing in Self-Custody: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The statement comes as Binance comes under intense scrutiny from both the private and the public sectors, as well as its own customers.
articles.title: Binance CEO Tells Staff Next Few Months ‘Will Be Bumpy’: Report

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Australia's move to rope in crypto into a new licensing regime is part of the Treasury's ambitions to "modernize" its financial system.
articles.title: Australia to Launch Crypto Licensing Regime to ‘Modernize’ Financial System

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: As the wider crypto market recovered some ground on Tuesday, the Avalanche and Solana tokens are among the day's top gainers.
articles.title: Avalanche, Solana Jump as Crypto Market Claws Back $26 Billion Overnight

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: A judge has decided to keep the ex-CEO in custody as his legal team fights to keep him out of the U.S.
articles.title: SBF Denied Bail, Will Fight Extradition from The Bahamas

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The tech giant plans to let iPhone and iPad users install apps from outside the App Store, a new report claims, due to EU regulations.
articles.title: Apple Plans to Allow External iOS Apps in Potential Boon for Crypto, NFTs

articles.description: The Caribbean regulator claims John J. Ray III may be saying things to “advance questionable agendas.”
articles.title: Bahamas Regulators Slam New FTX Chief For ‘Key Misstatements’

articles.description: The U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York gave insight today into the charges levied against Sam Bankman-Fried.
articles.title: FTX 'One of the Biggest Financial Frauds in American History': Prosecutor Damian Williams

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The exchange saw a total net outflow of over $3.6 billion in the past week as crypto firms and users pulled out funds.
articles.title: Binance Customer Withdrawals Exceed $3 Billion in 24 Hours

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce has a lot of optimism about crypto, and hopes to not see hasty, reactionary regulations in the wake of FTX.
articles.title: SEC’s Hester Peirce Has Seen ‘No Real Movement’ on SEC Crypto Regulation Since She Joined in 2018

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: "Nothing against QuickBooks. Very nice tool," Ray said. "It's not for a multibillion dollar company."
articles.title: FTX Did Its Invoicing, Expenses Over Slack and QuickBooks: New CEO John Ray

articles.description: Alongside charges from the Southern District of New York’s Attorney and the SEC, the CFTC is suing the FTX founder for additional violations.
articles.title: CFTC Suing Sam Bankman-Fried, FTX and Alameda for Violating Commodities Laws

articles.description: The disgraced crypto mogul was arrested in the Bahamas yesterday night.
articles.title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Hit With Eight Criminal Charges

articles.description: With the release of a mobile version, Ava Labs’ Core Wallet is taking an important step towards creating an interconnected Web3 experience.
articles.title: Avalanche’s Core Wallet Goes Mobile With Android Launch

articles.description: The ever-awake crypto Twitter erupted once the news of Sam Bankman-Fried being arrested in the Bahamas broke out.
articles.title: 'SBF's PR Tour Has Concluded': Crypto Twitter Reacts to FTX Founder's Arrest

articles.description: Following an executive vote, DAI holders who deposit their holdings into the “DAI Savings Rate” smart contract can rake in a fixed yield.
articles.title: DeFi’s Central Bank MakerDAO Relaunches 1% Fixed Yield for DAI Holders

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: "Nobody a year ago talked about bankruptcy remote—now it's the first question that people ask," the Anchorage co-founder told Decrypt.

articles.description: Bitcoin, Ethereum and the broader crypto market jumped after the latest CPI Report indicated that inflation is cooling.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Dogecoin Jump as CPI Report Shows Cooling Inflation

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Following “recent events in the crypto market,” Canada’s securities regulator is clamping down hard on crypto firms.
articles.title: Canada to Prohibit Crypto Firms From Offering Leveraged Trading to Citizens

articles.description: One day after Bankman-Fried was arrested in the Bahamas, the SEC has officially charged him with defrauding FTX's equity investors.
articles.title: SEC Charges Sam Bankman-Fried for Allegedly Defrauding FTX Equity Investors

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The FSB's proposed rules come as many jurisdictions, such as the UK and European Union, finally clarify their regulations around crypto.
articles.title: Financial Stability Board to Hold Crypto Providers to ‘Same Standards as Banks’

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: A California court ruled that the CFTC needs to notify a specific token holder within the Ooki DAO rather than the entire DAO.
articles.title: CFTC Must Serve Ooki DAO Founders: California Judge

articles.description: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman has been in crypto since the beginning and has seen a lot of cycles and failures. She joined Stacy Elliott and Dan Roberts and brought the fire on FTX and Sam Bankman-Fried’s mismanagement, “decentralization theater,” Tezos’s reputation and positioning, crypto sports marketing, and NFTs. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Tezos Co-Founder Kathleen Breitman Sounds Off on FTX Collapse

articles.description: Clay Robbins of Slow Ventures, Soona Amhaz of Volt Capital, Sarah Guo of Conviction and formerly Greylock, and Alex Strzesniewski of AngelBlock joined Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Summit in San Francisco on November 3 for an extensive panel on raising venture money even during Crypto Winter.
articles.title: Raising in a Bear Market: Slow Ventures, Volt Capital, Conviction, AngelBlock at 0xpo Summit

articles.description: Illa Da Producer accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Yuga Labs from presenter Alanna Roazzi-Laforet at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Moonbirds, Azuki, DeGods, and CloneX.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Bored Ape Yacht Club Wins NFT Project of the Year

articles.description: Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon accepted the industry achievement award from presenter Clara Tsao of Filecoin Foundation at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Art Blocks Founder Wins Industry Achievement Award

articles.description: Rachel Weiss and Jackie Courtney accepted the Cryptie for BFF from presenter Rebecca Barkin of Lamina1 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were WomenRise, Boys Club, and The Hug.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: BFF Wins Diversity Award

articles.description: Katrina Wolfe accepted the Cryptie for Crypto Unicorns from presenter Avery Akkineni of Vayner3 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Stepn, Zed Run, and Blankos Block Party.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Crypto Unicorns Wins Game of the Year

articles.description: Marek Olszewski accepted the Cryptie for Celo from presenter Dan Roberts of Decrypt Media at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Ukraine DAO, Dream DAO, Proof of Protest, and Digital Diaspora.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Celo Wins Social Impact Award

articles.description: Simone Berry and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie for People of Crypto's Metaverse Pride Parade from presenter Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: People of Crypto Wins Metaverse Event of the Year

articles.description: Shirley Cedeno and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Doodles from presenters Igor Lilic and Gabriela Ramos Lilic of Breakout at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were RTFKT and Nike, Gmoney and Adidas, Tiffany and CryptoPunks, and TIMEpieces.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Doodles Collab With Shopify Wins Mainstream Award

articles.description: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year

articles.description: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year

articles.description: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business—plus misconceptions in the crypto space.
articles.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads

articles.description: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.
articles.title: Fintech Lawyer: Crypto Companies Need to Seek Legal Advice Before Launch

articles.description: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he’s looking forward to in Web3.
articles.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads

articles.description: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.
articles.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.
articles.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.
articles.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'
